name: Seismic Slam
battleText: Looks to the ground, raises two fingers to the sky, and the ground splits beneath the foe, a snap of fingers is heard and the ground quickly closes in around the enemy for

name: Judgement
battleText: Everything goes black as a helmed figure appears and dips his head. Suddenly a sharp piercing light appears from the sky and floods the skull of the enemy for

name: Quickshot
battleText: You quickly throw a dagger at the enemy for

name: Firebolt
battleText: You clasp your hands 🙏 and conjure a fire ball launching it at the enemy for
